title: Scheduled myki maintenance Saturday 6 December 2025
articleDescription: myki account access and top ups unavailable on Saturday 6 December, between 12:00am and 8:00am.
articleContent:
We’re performing planned myki system upgrades on Saturday 6 November between 12:00am and 8:00am.

During the upgrade, you’ll be unable to access your myki account, top up online or top up instantly via the PTV app. 

During the upgrade, you can top up your myki card at:

  • authorised retail outlets, including all 7-Elevens within the myki boundary
  • staffed train stations
  • myki machines at selected stations and stops.


Mobile myki can still be used during the upgrade; however, you won’t be able to add a new Mobile myki to your Google Wallet or top up an existing Mobile myki. 
.
Thank you for your patience while we complete these upgrades.
articleText: We’re performing planned myki system upgrades on Saturday 6 November between 12:00am and 8:00am.During the upgrade, you’ll be unable to access your myki account, top up online or top up instantly via the PTV app. During the upgrade, you can top up your myki card at:authorised retail outlets, including all 7-Elevens within the myki boundarystaffed train stationsmyki machines at selected stations and stops.Mobile myki can still be used during the upgrade; however, you won’t be able to add a new Mobile myki to your Google Wallet or top up an existing Mobile myki. .Thank you for your patience while we complete these upgrades.
